tool_description: Analyzes the sentiment and emotional tone of review content to assist in moderation decisions and content understanding.

review_text.description: Review text to analyze for sentiment

analyze_emotions.description: Whether to perform detailed emotion analysis beyond basic sentiment

error_messages: Empty review text: Review text cannot be empty for sentiment analysis
Text too long: Review text exceeds maximum analysis length
Analysis failed: Unable to process the provided text for sentiment analysis
usage: Provide review text to analyze sentiment and emotional tone. Enable analyze_emotions for more detailed emotional analysis beyond basic positive/negative sentiment.

sentiment_score.description: Sentiment intensity score (-1 to 1, negative to positive)

emotions_detected.description: List of emotions detected in the text
